abstract:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is the new legal framework
for data protection throughout Europe. A few new instruments are
introduced, among others "Data Protection by Design" and "Data
Protection by Default". The talk will give an overview of the GDPR, go
into detail concerning those provisions that are related to built-in
privacy and data protection as well as security, and inform about
requirements and options for developers.

title: Keynote: Building in Privacy and Data Protection -- what is demanded by the GDPR?
